summary: REQ-12 appears implemented via an updated controls legend string in GameView. REQ-11 appears implemented via collectible generation changes in worldMap to push the first star farther from spawn while keeping 7 total. However, the diff also indicates unrequested gameplay/world changes (notably corridor length increase and added/changed pickup SFX/spin behavior), which conflict with stated constraints/non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: World generation shape/size changed by increasing corridor length to 50 * MAP_UNIT (5000px), beyond just repositioning the first star.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to change world generation shape/size beyond repositioning the first star.
evidence: frontend/src/features/game/worldMap.ts (truncated): `const CORRIDOR_LENGTH = 50 * MAP_UNIT; // Extended downward corridor (5000 pixels = 2.5× the original 2000)`

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed star pickup sound effect loading/usage.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals include: “Do not add ... new sound/animation work.” No requirement requests SFX changes.
evidence: frontend/src/features/game/GameView.tsx (truncated): `// Load pickup sound effect` and `new Audio('/assets/sfx/star-pickup.mp3')`

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed Space-triggered spin animation behavior tied to Space press.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals include: “Do not add ... new sound/animation work.” Only requested change to legend text and first star placement; no request to add/modify spin animation.
